BlackStorm:

BlackStorm tembled and her face was pale 

"How deep was that love? do you know if he tried or are trying to 
contact me??? did he treat me good?"she said stamering, afraid that 
someone else beyond them was hearing that conversation



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He nods solemnly.  "Yes, you were a Maximal.  A Maximal of 
no great 
> importance for some time."  He stares up at the ceiling wondering 
as to how he 
> should proceed.  "You were kidnapped from the Maximal base by 
Flicker who was 
> there as a spy.  Originally you were to be kept as a hostage so he 
could 
> escape.  They decided to keep you because..."  He pauses for a 
moment again 
> searching for words.  "It's because of your relationship with the 
Maximal commander, 
> Rodimus Prime.  You two were ... in love."  He looks down at the 
table and then 
> back up at her nervously.
